text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki manages to complete the<n>Japanese
Derby in full. She's exhausted<n>by the long race,
but everyone is<n>inspired by her efforts.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Her gallant form stirs even the heart of<n>the
younger student, who finds herself<n>wanting to
keep watching Fuji Kiseki.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Next up is the long-distance Kikuka Sho.<n>I worry
whether Fuji Kiseki can handle it,<n>but she's full of
nothing but confidence.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: Next on our schedule is the Kikuka Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Our race through the summer toward the<n>Kikuka
Sho and the strong opponents<n>waiting there
begins now!
